actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To establish a direct loan program for less-than-half-time students to improve their job skills, and for other purposes.
short_title: Financial Aid for Skill Enhancement Act of 2000

summary.text: Financial Aid for Skill Enhancement Act of 2000 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a direct loan program for less-than-half-time students to acquire and improve their job skills.Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to employer-provided educational assistance programs to exclude from an employee's gross income any employer payments on such student loans.

titles.title: Financial Aid for Skill Enhancement Act of 2000
To establish a direct loan program for less-than-half-time students to improve their job skills, and for other purposes.
